profile.name: Zach Rodgers
profile.statement: A recently graduated industrial designer driven to create innovative solutions. With an entrepreneurial spirit. Zach has successfully launched multiple small businesses and pursues many personal design projects in his practice. Design is his passion, bringing joy and fueling his commitment to making a positive impact on the world.

experience.title: Chief Technical Officer
experience.description: Zach is the co-founder of Parallel Parking Solutions Inc., leading the software team building a SaaS platform for ALPR-powered smart parking systems.

experience.title: Industrial Design Intern
experience.description: Lead designer for electric side-by-side and assisted in projects involving autonomous vehicles, recreational products, watersports, vehicle bucks, and consumer electronics.

experience.title: Owner
experience.description: Drone piloting, aerial imagery and cinematography company. Ranging from high-end real estate, marketing promotions, agricultural mapping, and commercial video production.

education.title: Bachelor of Industrial Design
education.description: Zach is a 2024 Carleton Industrial Design graduate with High Distinction who served as a Teaching Assistant, reviewed portfolios at recruitment events, and helped organize the programâ€™s 50th anniversary.
